lead_paragraph: The United States will face host China on Aug. 10 in the final game on the opening day of the Olympic men’s basketball tournament. FIBA announced the game times for the preliminary rounds of the men’s and women’s tournaments. Their Americans’ games are scheduled for either 8 p.m. or 10:15 p.m. local time. Beijing is 12 hours ahead of Eastern time. The United States women play a qualifier in their Aug. 9 opener then play China on Aug. 11 at 8 p.m.
